description: Building a backend with Js and PostgrSQL expose the endpoint using Node.js  for users to be able to PUT , EDIT into the database What API technology Node.js- Server-Side Development: Node.js is commonly used for building server-side applications, including:     -  Web servers (like those built with Express.js).        - APIs (that provide data to web and mobile apps).        - Backend services.
